products.name: Abundance
products.description: Abundance™ combines oils such as Orange and Ginger, which were used by ancient cultures to attract prosperity and magnify joy and peace.
products.excerpt: Abundance™ combines oils such as Orange and Ginger, which were used by ancient cultures to attract prosperity and magnify joy and peace.

products.name: Acceptance
products.description: Containing Coriander and Geranium essential oils, Acceptance™ encourages feelings of self-worth when used aromatically.
products.excerpt: Containing Coriander and Geranium essential oils, Acceptance™ encourages feelings of self-worth when used aromatically.

Citrus Aurantium Amara† (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil (Neroli)
Chamomilla Recutita† (Matricaria) Flower Oil Cananga odorata†(Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil

products.name: Angelica
products.description: Angelica has soothing aromatic qualities that help create a relaxing environment. It has been referred to as the "oil of angels," in part because of its calming aroma.
products.excerpt: Angelica has soothing aromatic qualities that help create a relaxing environment.

products.name: Aroma Life
products.description: Aroma Life™ uses Marjoram and Ylang Ylang essential oils to energize your spirit and create a sense of connection.
products.excerpt: Aroma Life™ uses Marjoram and Ylang Ylang essential oils to energize your spirit and create a sense of connection.

products.name: Aroma Siez
products.description: A key Young Living blend, Aroma Siez™ combines the soothing and relaxing properties of Lavender and Peppermint.
products.excerpt: A key Young Living blend, Aroma Siez™ combines the soothing and relaxing properties of Lavender and Peppermint.

products.name: AromaEase™ - 5ml
products.description: AromaEase™ essential oil blend has a cool, minty fragrance and contains powerful essential oil constituents that contribute to a calming aroma. Formulated with Peppermint, Spearmint, Ginger, Cardamom, and Fennel, Aroma Ease essential oil is perfect for diffusing around your home, office, or even in your car. While there are many Aroma Ease essential oil uses, it is particularly effective when diffused.
products.excerpt: AromaEase™ essential oil blend has a cool, minty fragrance and contains powerful essential oil constituents that contribute to a calming aroma.

products.name: Australian Blue
products.description: Australian Blue™ is often used to uplift the spirit. This blend contains Blue Cypress, which is produced from the distillation of the highly prized Callitris intratropica wood in Australia.
products.excerpt: Australian Blue™ is often used to uplift the spirit.

products.name: Awaken
products.description: Awaken™ is a blend of five other blends. Expertly formulated to help you become aware of limitless potential when used aromatically, Awaken is the first step toward making positive life changes.
products.excerpt: Awaken™ is a blend of five other blends.
ingredients: Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (furanocoumarin-Free Bergamot) Peel Oil

products.name: Balsam Fir (Idaho)
products.description: Idaho Balsam Fir has a woodsy and refreshing scent. Diffuse for a grounding and calming aroma.
products.excerpt: Idaho Balsam Fir has a woodsy and refreshing scent.

products.name: Basil
products.description: Basil essential oil has a fresh, herbaceous aroma that can be calming and refreshing. Dilute with V-6 or another carrier oil when applying directly to desired area.
products.excerpt: Basil essential oil has a fresh, herbaceous aroma that can be calming and refreshing.

products.name: Believe  (New Formula)
products.description: Believe™ contains Idaho Blue Spruce, Idaho Balsam Fir, Frankincense, and other essential oils that may encourage feelings of strength and faith when used aromatically.
products.excerpt: Believe™ contains Idaho Blue Spruce, Idaho Balsam Fir, Frankincense, and other essential oils that may encourage feelings of strength and faith when used aromatically.
ingredients: Picea Pungens† (Idaho Blue Spruce) Branch/leaf/wood Oil

products.name: Bergamot
products.description: Bergamot essential oil has a light citrus aroma, which makes it a great oil to help you get going in the morning or refresh your kitchen before dinner. The peel of the yellow-green, orange-shaped fruit is cold pressed to create the pure Young Living Bergamot oil found in homes around the world.
products.excerpt: Bergamot essential oil has a light citrus aroma, which makes it a great oil to help you get going in the morning or refresh your kitchen before dinner.

products.name: Black Pepper
products.description: Black Pepper is beautifully fragrant when used aromatically. Inhale directly for its energizing aroma or pair with other oils such as Peppermint, Wintergreen, or Clove.
products.excerpt: Black Pepper is beautifully fragrant when used aromatically.

products.name: Blue Cypress
products.description: Blue Cypress is produced from the steam distillation of the wood of the tree, which is indigenous to Australia. Traditionally used to moisturize dry skin, this oil also has historical use as a component in perfumes and even as an adhesive.
products.excerpt: Blue Cypress is produced from the steam distillation of the wood of the tree, which is indigenous to Australia.

products.name: Blue Tansy
products.description: For years Young Living members have enjoyed the benefits of Blue Tansy essential oil in blends such as Valor®, Peace & Calming®, and JuvaFlex®. Now it can be yours as a single oil, and you can discover for yourself how to use Blue Tansy as an aromatic in your diffuser, as a topical application in your own homemade Blue Tansy skin care products, and in plenty of other ways as you use and share this exclusive oil.
products.excerpt: For years Young Living members have enjoyed the benefits of Blue Tansy essential oil in blends such as Valor®, Peace & Calming®, and JuvaFlex®.

products.name: Brain Power
products.description: Brain Power™ is a blend of essential oils high in sesquiterpenes—like Royal Hawaiian Sandalwood, Blue Cypress, and Frankincense—to promote a sense of clarity and focus when used aromatically.
products.excerpt: Brain Power™ is a blend of essential oils high in sesquiterpenes—like Royal Hawaiian Sandalwood, Blue Cypress, and Frankincense—to promote a sense of clarity and focus when used aromatically.

products.name: Build Your Dream™ - 5ml
products.description: Combining essential oils chosen by D. Gary Young for their connections to our history, Build Your Dream™ empowers and clarifies to help you find the way to achieve your dreams when used aromatically.
products.excerpt: Combining essential oils chosen by D.
ingredients: Picea Pungens† (Idaho Blue Spruce) Branch/leaf/wood Oil
Santalum Paniculatum† (Royal Hawaiian™ Sandalwood) Wood Oil

products.name: Cardamom
products.description: Cardamom is a member of the ginger family, and features a spicy, refreshing aroma that can be uplifting.
products.excerpt: Cardamom is a member of the ginger family, and features a spicy, refreshing aroma that can be uplifting.

products.name: Carrot Seed
products.description: Produced from distillation of the seeds of the wild carrot plant, Carrot Seed has a mildly sweet aroma with earthy, herbaceous notes.
products.excerpt: Produced from distillation of the seeds of the wild carrot plant, Carrot Seed has a mildly sweet aroma with earthy, herbaceous notes.

products.name: Cedarwood
products.description: Cedarwood (Cedrus atlantica) has a warm, woodsy aroma that creates a comforting, uplifting experience. Use Cedarwood oil to add its invigorating scent to your life through aromatic and topical uses.
products.excerpt: Cedarwood (Cedrus atlantica) has a warm, woodsy aroma that creates a comforting, uplifting experience.

products.name: Celery Seed
products.description: Produced from the steam distillation of dried seeds, Celery Seed was used historically for its calming, relaxing, and uplifting aroma.
products.excerpt: Produced from the steam distillation of dried seeds, Celery Seed was used historically for its calming, relaxing, and uplifting aroma.

products.name: Christmas Spirit
products.description: With some of our most popular Christmas essential oils, Christmas Spirt™ taps into the happiness, joy, and comfort associated with the holiday season. It combines Orange, Cinnamon Bark, and Spruce to create a warm, spicy, and sweet Christmas essential oil blend that’s sure to be loved by everyone in the family.
products.excerpt: With some of our most popular Christmas essential oils, Christmas Spirt™ taps into the happiness, joy, and comfort associated with the holiday season.

products.name: Cinnamon Bark
products.description: Warm and comforting, Cinnamon Bark essential oil’s familiar aroma comes from the naturally occurring constituent cinnamaldehyde. Cinnamon Bark oil is a key part of our proprietary, top-selling Thieves® essential oil blend, combining with Clove essential oil to give Thieves its signature spicy aroma.
products.excerpt: Warm and comforting, Cinnamon Bark essential oil’s familiar aroma comes from the naturally occurring constituent cinnamaldehyde.

products.name: Cistus
products.description: Cistus is believed to be the biblical rose of Sharon, and its honey-like fragrance is soothing and uplifting.
products.excerpt: Cistus is believed to be the biblical rose of Sharon, and its honey-like fragrance is soothing and uplifting.

products.name: Citronella
products.description: Citronella oil is steam distilled from the leafy parts of the citronella plant, also known as Cymbopogon nardus. Thanks to its fresh, welcoming aroma, Citronella essential oil is a common element in perfumes and cosmetic products and is well known for its use in outdoor candles, sprays, lotions, and other camping and outdoor essentials.
products.excerpt: Citronella oil is steam distilled from the leafy parts of the citronella plant, also known as Cymbopogon nardus.

products.name: Citrus Fresh
products.description: Combining Orange, Tangerine, Grapefruit, Lemon, and Mandarin oils with a hint of Spearmint, Citrus Fresh™ Essential Oil is a proprietary Young Living blend that offers an uplifting, refreshing aroma that you can diffuse to transform home, work, and classroom spaces.
products.excerpt: Combining Orange, Tangerine, Grapefruit, Lemon, and Mandarin oils with a hint of Spearmint, Citrus Fresh™ Essential Oil is a proprietary Young Living blend that offers an uplifting, refreshing aroma that you can diffuse to transform home, work, and classroom spaces.

products.name: Clarity
products.description: Clarity™ blends Basil, Rosemary, Peppermint, and other essential oils for an aroma that invites a sense of clarity and alertness.
products.excerpt: Clarity™ blends Basil, Rosemary, Peppermint, and other essential oils for an aroma that invites a sense of clarity and alertness.

products.name: Clary Sage
products.description: Clary Sage has an herbaceous aroma that is believed to create a calm and relaxing environment.
products.excerpt: Clary Sage has an herbaceous aroma that is believed to create a calm and relaxing environment.

products.name: Clove
products.description: Clove oil (Syzygium aromaticum) has a spicy, warm scent that’s instantly familiar because of its connection to fall and winter holidays. To produce Clove essential oil, the flower bud and plant stem are steam distilled, and the rich, strong oil that results from this process contains eugenol. This powerful constituent makes it a potent essential oil, and Clove oil uses include topical applications such as massage oils and personal care products.
products.excerpt: Clove oil (Syzygium aromaticum) has a spicy, warm scent that’s instantly familiar because of its connection to fall and winter holidays.

products.name: Common Sense
products.description: Common Sense™ essential oil is a proprietary blend of Young Living essential oils formulated to enhance rational decision-making abilities leading to increased wellness, purpose, and abundance.
products.excerpt: Common Sense™ essential oil is a proprietary blend of Young Living essential oils formulated to enhance rational decision-making abilities leading to increased wellness, purpose, and abundance.

products.name: Cool Azul
products.description: Cool Azul™ is a proprietary essential oil blend created by D. Gary Young that includes the light aroma of Dorado Azul and the warm fragrance of Plectranthus Oregano (both Young Living exclusive oils), along with Peppermint, Wintergreen, Sage, Copaiba, Blue Cypress, Elemi, and other oils. Apply this blend topically for a cool sensation and aromatic experience. Cool Azul is ideal for use before, during, and after physical activities. Attach an AromaGlide™ roller fitment to the bottle and pack it in your gym bag, purse, or backpack for quick and easy on-the-go use.
products.excerpt: Cool Azul™ is a proprietary essential oil blend created by D. Gary Young that includes the light aroma of Dorado Azul and the warm fragrance of Plectranthus Oregano (both Young Living exclusive oils), along with Peppermint, Wintergreen, Sage, Copaiba, Blue Cypress, Elemi, and other oils.

products.name: Copaiba
products.description: Known for its gentle, woodsy aroma, Copaiba essential oil is a product of steam distilling the gum resin tapped from the Brazilian Copaifera reticulata tree. With high levels of beta-caryophyllene and a uniquely sweet aromatic profile, Copaiba oil helps create a relaxing atmosphere when diffused or applied topically.
products.excerpt: Known for its gentle, woodsy aroma, Copaiba essential oil is a product of steam distilling the gum resin tapped from the Brazilian Copaifera reticulata tree.

products.name: Coriander
products.description: Coriander has a sweet, warm fragrance that is calming and gently uplifting. Dilute when using topically, then apply directly to target areas.
products.excerpt: Coriander has a sweet, warm fragrance that is calming and gently uplifting.

products.name: Cypress
products.description: Cypress has a fresh, herbaceous aroma that can promote a sense of security and grounding.
products.excerpt: Cypress has a fresh, herbaceous aroma that can promote a sense of security and grounding.

products.name: DiGize
products.description: DiGize™ essential oil is one of our most unique essential oil blends, combining Tarragon, Ginger, Peppermint, Juniper, Lemongrass, Anise, and Patchouli oils for a spicy, exotic aromatic blend. DiGize oil also includes Fennel essential oil, the use of which dates back to ancient Egypt.
products.excerpt: DiGize™ essential oil is one of our most unique essential oil blends, combining Tarragon, Ginger, Peppermint, Juniper, Lemongrass, Anise, and Patchouli oils for a spicy, exotic aromatic blend.

products.name: Dill
products.description: Dill essential oil is produced from the distillation of the whole plant and is believed to be calming when used aromatically. This oil can be blended with Roman Chamomile to enhance any relaxing aromatic experience.
products.excerpt: Dill essential oil is produced from the distillation of the whole plant and is believed to be calming when used aromatically.

products.name: Dorado Azul
products.description: A unique essential oil from Ecuador, Dorado Azul™ is exclusive to Young Living. Its fresh scent is perfect for aromatic or topical use.
products.excerpt: A unique essential oil from Ecuador, Dorado Azul™ is exclusive to Young Living.

products.name: Dragon Time
products.description: Dragon Time is a proprietary blend of Fennel, Clary Sage, Marjoram, Lavender, Blue Yarrow, and Jasmine essential oils. Its sweet, herbaceous aroma can help promote feelings of stability and calm during cycles of moodiness. Diffuse, inhale directly, or apply Dragon Time topically to experience its steadying aromatic properties.
products.excerpt: Dragon Time is a proprietary blend of Fennel, Clary Sage, Marjoram, Lavender, Blue Yarrow, and Jasmine essential oils.

products.name: Dream Catcher
products.description: Dream Catcher™ is designed to harness the power of positive dreams when used aromatically, helping you realize your desires and stay on the path to fulfillment.
products.excerpt: Dream Catcher™ is designed to harness the power of positive dreams when used aromatically, helping you realize your desires and stay on the path to fulfillment.

products.name: Egyptian Gold
products.description: Egyptian Gold™ contains ancient biblical oils that can be used to enhance moments of devotion and reverence.
products.excerpt: Egyptian Gold™ contains ancient biblical oils that can be used to enhance moments of devotion and reverence.
ingredients: Picea Mariana† (Northern Lights Black Spruce) Leaf Oil

products.name: Elemi
products.description: Part of the same family as Frankincense and Myrrh, Elemi has been used traditionally to support the appearance of the skin.
products.excerpt: Part of the same family as Frankincense and Myrrh, Elemi has been used traditionally to support the appearance of the skin.

products.name: En-R-Gee
products.description: Fresh and herbaceous, En-R-Gee essential oil blend offers an invigorating aromatic boost when you need it most. Diffuse or apply it topically during your morning routine or before any activity to enjoy the stimulating, spicy-pine fragrance of Rosemary, Juniper, Lemongrass, Nutmeg, Balsam Fir, Clove, and Black Pepper essential oils.
products.excerpt: Fresh and herbaceous, En-R-Gee essential oil blend offers an invigorating aromatic boost when you need it most.

products.name: Endoflex
products.description: EndoFlex™ is a blend of Spearmint, Geranium, and other pure essential oils that helps create a calming and balancing aroma when diffused.
products.excerpt: EndoFlex™ is a blend of Spearmint, Geranium, and other pure essential oils that helps create a calming and balancing aroma when diffused.

products.name: Envision
products.description: Envision™ contains scents that stimulate feelings of creativity and resourcefulness, encouraging renewed faith in the future and the strength necessary to achieve your dreams.
products.excerpt: Envision™ contains scents that stimulate feelings of creativity and resourcefulness, encouraging renewed faith in the future and the strength necessary to achieve your dreams.

products.name: Eucalyptus Blue
products.description: Eucalyptus Blue is grown and distilled on Young Living’s farm in Ecuador. This essential oil is high in eucalyptol, which has a calming and invigorating scent when diffused.
products.excerpt: Eucalyptus Blue is grown and distilled on Young Living’s farm in Ecuador.

products.name: Eucalyptus Globulus
products.description: Like Eucalyptus Radiata, Eucalyptus Globulus is a eucalyptus oil from the large, aromatic eucalyptus trees of the Myrtaceae family. The tree’s leaves are steam distilled to produce the earthy, fresh oil that is popular in personal care products and spa treatments.
products.excerpt: Like Eucalyptus Radiata, Eucalyptus Globulus is a eucalyptus oil from the large, aromatic eucalyptus trees of the Myrtaceae family.

products.name: Eucalyptus Radiata
products.description: Eucalyptus Radiata essential oil comes from an evergreen tree native to Australia that is part of the Myrtaceae plant family. Steam distilled from the leaves, Eucalyptus Radiata essential oil is loved for its fresh, sharply clean aroma. Diffuse Eucalyptus Radiata oil to promote a stimulating and rejuvenating environment. There are many other Eucalyptus Radiata uses loved by members, including using it in invigorating massage after activity. Found in many of Young Living’s popular products, including Ortho Ease® Massage Oil, Breathe Again™ Roll-On, and R.C.™ essential oil blend, Eucalyptus oil is a must-have in your home.
products.excerpt: Eucalyptus Radiata essential oil comes from an evergreen tree native to Australia that is part of the Myrtaceae plant family.

products.name: Exodus II
products.description: Exodus II™ is a blend of essential oils that has cleansing properties, particularly when applied to the feet.
products.excerpt: Exodus II™ is a blend of essential oils that has cleansing properties, particularly when applied to the feet.

products.name: Faith Inspired by Oola - 5ml
products.description: Faith is defined as a complete trust or confidence in someone or something. It is your purpose in life. How you see your place in this world is something that you need to explore to attain Oola.
products.excerpt: Faith is defined as a complete trust or confidence in someone or something.

products.name: Family Inspired by Oola - 5ml
products.description: Family relationships are powerful and can sometimes be complicated. If you can harness the pure love from healthy family relationships, you will grow and progress toward your OolaLife.
products.excerpt: Family relationships are powerful and can sometimes be complicated.

products.name: Fennel
products.description: Fennel essential oil (Foeniculum vulgare) is steam distilled from the crushed seeds of the fennel plant. The leafy herb is native to regions of southern Europe and Asia Minor, but it has since naturalized in locations around the world. Fennel has a rich aroma reminiscent of anise, which gives Fennel oil its licorice-like scent. Although the seeds and oil are used in flavoring, fennel’s complex aroma has also made it popular in soaps, candles, and perfumes.
products.excerpt: Fennel essential oil (Foeniculum vulgare) is steam distilled from the crushed seeds of the fennel plant.

products.name: Field Inspired by Oola - 5ml
products.description: Field is your career, your vocation, or your role in life. Some of us are raising children full time. Others have a day job or even work a few jobs to stay afloat. Many of us aspire to our “dream job” and finding balance in this area with all the other responsibilities of life.
products.excerpt: Field is your career, your vocation, or your role in life.

products.name: Finance Inspired by Oola - 5ml
products.description: Manage and balance your finances, and be free of debt. Be a good steward of the money entrusted to you. Debt is not compatible with the OolaLife and is a major stressor in many people’s lives. Live free of this burden and start taking steps to improving your finances.
products.excerpt: Manage and balance your finances, and be free of debt.

products.name: Fitness Inspired by Oola - 5ml
products.description: Your physical health affects everything you do and every area of your life. Fitness is about feeling good, looking good, being healthy, and being productive. It’s how you move your body and what you put into your body.
products.excerpt: Your physical health affects everything you do and every area of your life.
ingredients: Picea Pungens† (Idaho Blue Spruce) Branch/leaf/wood Oil

products.name: Forgiveness
products.description: Forgiveness™ contains an aroma that supports the ability to forgive yourself and others while letting go of negative emotions, an important part of personal growth.
products.excerpt: Forgiveness™ contains an aroma that supports the ability to forgive yourself and others while letting go of negative emotions, an important part of personal growth.

products.name: Frankincense
products.description: It’s no surprise that Frankincense (Boswellia carterii) has been sought after since ancient times. The complex aroma of this oil can elevate many aspects of your life. Diffuse Young Living Frankincense oil to refine your sense of purpose or add it to your beauty routine for a luxurious experience.
products.excerpt: It’s no surprise that Frankincense (Boswellia carterii) has been sought after since ancient times.

products.name: Friends Inspired by Oola - 5ml
products.description: A social circle, comprised of both friends and acquaintances, is vital to our well-being. It is valuable to expand and improve your friend base as you pursue a life in Oola.
products.excerpt: A social circle, comprised of both friends and acquaintances, is vital to our well-being.

products.name: Fulfill Your Destiny
products.description: Sweet, fresh, and spicy, Young Living’s Fulfill Your Destiny™ blend encompasses the complex and beautiful journey that leads to achieving your goals and highest potential. With nine carefully selected essential oils—Tangerine, Frankincense, Nutmeg, Cassia, Cardamom, Clary Sage, Black Pepper, Idaho Blue Spruce, and Neroli—this proprietary blend will help you create an atmosphere of focus and clarity no matter where your path to fulfilling your destiny takes you.
products.excerpt: Sweet, fresh, and spicy, Young Living’s Fulfill Your Destiny™ blend encompasses the complex and beautiful journey that leads to achieving your goals and highest potential.
ingredients: Picea Pungens† (Idaho Blue Spruce) Branch/leaf/wood Oil
Citrus Aurantium Amara† (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil

products.name: Fun Inspired by Oola - 5ml
products.description: Fun is a very unique category to you. It is whatever activity or hobby you are personally passionate about. If you don’t have time for fun, then you need more fun in your life!
products.excerpt: Fun is a very unique category to you.

products.name: GLF
products.description: GLF™ is a blend of essential oils that includes Helichrysum, Spearmint, and Celery.
products.excerpt: GLF™ is a blend of essential oils that includes Helichrysum, Spearmint, and Celery.

products.name: Gathering
products.description: Gathering™ features a blend of aromas that invites you to overcome the chaotic energy of everyday life and keeps you on the path to higher achievement.
products.excerpt: Gathering™ features a blend of aromas that invites you to overcome the chaotic energy of everyday life and keeps you on the path to higher achievement.
ingredients: Picea Mariana† (Northern Lights Black Spruce) Leaf Oil
Santalum Paniculatum† (Royal Hawaiian Sandalwood™¬) Wood Oil

products.name: Gentle Baby  - 5 ml
products.description: Gentle Baby™ essential oil blend is formulated with Coriander, Geranium, Palmarosa, Lavender, Ylang Ylang, Roman Chamomile, and other sweet-smelling essential oils. Gentle Baby oil’s soothing blend of pure essential oils has an aroma that invites a sense of calming for parents and children. The uses for Gentle Baby essential oil are countless, but its soft fragrance is perfect for diffusing in your home or child’s bedroom in the evening or for applying topically to your face to help keep the appearance of a healthy complexion and enhance a youthful appearance. The scent of Gentle Baby oil evokes tranquil, nurtured feelings that can be a wonderful companion for times of inner reflection.
products.excerpt: Gentle Baby™ essential oil blend is formulated with Coriander, Geranium, Palmarosa, Lavender, Ylang Ylang, Roman Chamomile, and other sweet-smelling essential oils.

products.name: Geranium
products.description: Geranium essential oil (Pelargonium graveolens) is carefully steam distilled from the fragrant flowers and leaves of the popular plant native to southern Africa. With a sweet, floral scent, there are many topical and aromatic Geranium oil uses, including high-end perfumes and skin care products.
products.excerpt: Geranium essential oil (Pelargonium graveolens) is carefully steam distilled from the fragrant flowers and leaves of the popular plant native to southern Africa.

products.name: German Chamomile
products.description: German Chamomile has a calming aroma that helps create feelings of peace and patience. This oil can be applied neat or as part of massage to desired areas.
products.excerpt: German Chamomile has a calming aroma that helps create feelings of peace and patience.

products.name: Ginger
products.description: Ginger oil is a popular essential oil with a warm, energizing aroma. It is steam distilled from the rhizome of the ginger plant and is part of the Zingiberaceae family. Ginger was used anciently in India and China and was taken to the Mediterranean as early the 1st century AD. Ginger is now found throughout the world, and Ginger essential oil is found in many homes.
products.excerpt: Ginger oil is a popular essential oil with a warm, energizing aroma.

products.name: Goldenrod
products.description: Goldenrod flowering tops are distilled to produce this fragrant oil, which has been used traditionally for its calming and relaxing aroma.
products.excerpt: Goldenrod flowering tops are distilled to produce this fragrant oil, which has been used traditionally for its calming and relaxing aroma.

products.name: Grapefruit
products.description: We cold-press Grapefruit essential oil from the peels of the fresh fruit for a citrusy oil with the bright aroma of a grapefruit orchard. It’s this sweet, invigorating aroma that members enjoy for its ability to encourage feelings of joy, satisfaction, and playfulness.
products.excerpt: We cold-press Grapefruit essential oil from the peels of the fresh fruit for a citrusy oil with the bright aroma of a grapefruit orchard.

products.name: Gratitude
products.description: Foster a grateful attitude and embrace the blessings in your life. The uplifting aroma of Gratitude™ invites a feeling of emotional and spiritual progress.
products.excerpt: Foster a grateful attitude and embrace the blessings in your life.
ingredients: Picea Mariana† (Northern Lights Black Spruce) Leaf Oil

products.name: Grounding
products.description: Grounding™ is a balancing blend of scents used for feelings of clarity or to enhance spirituality.
products.excerpt: Grounding™ is a balancing blend of scents used for feelings of clarity or to enhance spirituality.

products.name: Harmony
products.description: Harmony™ is a blend of pure essential oils that contains scents to provide an uplifting aromatic experience.
products.excerpt: Harmony™ is a blend of pure essential oils that contains scents to provide an uplifting aromatic experience.

products.name: Helichrysum
products.description: Helichrysum oil comes from a flowering plant that’s traditionally wild crafted in the mountains along the Dalmatian coast of Croatia. Once ready, the flower is carefully harvested and steam distilled to create the valuable oil. Helichrysum oil uses include diffusing its sweet, stimulating scent during homework and study time, as well as applying the oil topically to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
products.excerpt: Helichrysum oil comes from a flowering plant that’s traditionally wild crafted in the mountains along the Dalmatian coast of Croatia.

products.name: Highest Potential
products.description: Highest Potential™ harnesses the uplifting and inspiring power of Blue Cypress and other pure essential oil scents.
products.excerpt: Highest Potential™ harnesses the uplifting and inspiring power of Blue Cypress and other pure essential oil scents.
ingredients: Picea Mariana† (Northern Lights Black Spruce) Leaf Oil

products.name: Hinoki
products.description: Hinoki comes from Japanese cypress and has a rich, invigorating citrus aroma that can increase spiritual awareness. Historically, Hinoki essential oil was used to refresh the soul.
products.excerpt: Hinoki comes from Japanese cypress and has a rich, invigorating citrus aroma that can increase spiritual awareness.

products.name: Hong Kuai
products.description: Hong Kuai has the highest sesquiterpene content of any Young Living essential oil. Its scent promotes spiritual awareness and inspires clarity, intuition, and action.
products.excerpt: Hong Kuai has the highest sesquiterpene content of any Young Living essential oil.
ingredients: Ingredients: Chameacyparis Formosensis† (Hong Kuai) Wood Oil.

products.name: Hope
products.description: The blend of essential oils found in Hope™ brings an aroma that invites you to restore your faith by reconnecting with feelings of strength and stability.
products.excerpt: The blend of essential oils found in Hope™ brings an aroma that invites you to restore your faith by reconnecting with feelings of strength and stability.

products.name: Humility
products.description: True humility is the foundation of emotional strength. Humility™ is a blend of pure essential oil scents that promotes deeper spiritual awareness.
products.excerpt: True humility is the foundation of emotional strength.
ingredients: Picea Mariana† (Northern Lights Black Spruce) Leaf Oil
Citrus Aurantium Amara† (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil

products.name: Hyssop
products.description: Hyssop has a slightly sweet scent and was considered a sacred oil in ancient Egypt, Israel, and Greece. Its fragrant scent stimulates creativity and meditation.
products.excerpt: Hyssop has a slightly sweet scent and was considered a sacred oil in ancient Egypt, Israel, and Greece.

products.name: Idaho Blue Spruce
products.description: Idaho Blue Spruce is an exclusive oil that is distilled at Young Living’s St. Maries farm. This remarkable essential oil contains high percentages of alpha-pinene and limonene and has a pleasing and relaxing evergreen aroma.
products.excerpt: Idaho Blue Spruce is an exclusive oil that is distilled at Young Living’s St. Maries farm.

products.name: Jasmine
products.description: Jasmine essential oil (Jasminium officinale) has a rich, sultry aroma that makes this oil feel alluring and romantic. It’s extracted from the flowering jasmine plant—part of the olive family—through absolute extraction.
products.excerpt: Jasmine essential oil (Jasminium officinale) has a rich, sultry aroma that makes this oil feel alluring and romantic.

products.name: Joy
products.description: Joy™ essential oil is a blend of Young Living’s most inviting oils, formulated to invite a sense of romance, bliss, and warmth when diffused. With Ylang Ylang, Geranium, Jasmine, Palmarosa, and Rose essential oil, Joy oil has a fresh, floral aroma with notes of citrus from the essential oils of Bergamot, Lemon, and Tangerine.
products.excerpt: Joy™ essential oil is a blend of Young Living’s most inviting oils, formulated to invite a sense of romance, bliss, and warmth when diffused.

products.description: Laurus Nobilis has a spicy scent that is uplifting. Ancient Greeks used leaves of the laurel tree to crown their victors and scholars.
products.excerpt: Laurus Nobilis has a spicy scent that is uplifting.

products.name: Lavender
products.description: Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) has a scent that’s a wonderful blend of fresh, floral, clean, and calm. It’s this dynamic aroma that has made the flower a classic for perfumes, soaps, fresheners, and beauty products. As one of our most popular products, Lavender oil is a great beginner oil and a must for every home.
products.excerpt: Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) has a scent that’s a wonderful blend of fresh, floral, clean, and calm.

products.name: Ledum
products.description: Ledum was used traditionally to support energy flow. It is one of the key ingredients in JuvaCleanse and GLF essential oil blends.

products.name: Lemon
products.description: Lemon essential oil is cold-pressed from the rinds of lemons, giving its aroma all the brightness of the freshly picked fruit. Cheerful, sweet, and nostalgic, Lemon oil can eliminate odors and infuse your whole home with its clean, lemon-drop scent when diffused.
products.excerpt: Lemon essential oil is cold-pressed from the rinds of lemons, giving its aroma all the brightness of the freshly picked fruit.

products.name: Lemon Myrtle
products.description: The fresh aroma of Lemon Myrtle is uplifting and refreshing, which may help clear the mind. .
products.excerpt: The fresh aroma of Lemon Myrtle is uplifting and refreshing, which may help clear the mind.

products.name: Lemongrass
products.description: Originating in Southeast Asia, Lemongrass essential oil is distilled from the leaves and woody stalks of the lemongrass plant. With a subtle citrus-herb scent, Lemongrass oil offers a sophisticated and relaxing aroma that transforms your home’s environment.
products.excerpt: Originating in Southeast Asia, Lemongrass essential oil is distilled from the leaves and woody stalks of the lemongrass plant.

products.name: Light The Fire - 5ml
products.description: The warm, spicy aroma of Light the Fire™ includes Mastrante and Northern Lights Black Spruce from Young Living’s Ecuador and Canada farms, along with Nutmeg, Cassia, Ocotea, Canadian Fleabane, Lemon, Pepper, and Hinoki. This unique and inspired essential oil blend was formulated by D. Gary Young for Young Living’s 2015 International Grand Convention. Diffuse this blend for an inspiring fragrance in any environment or add it to V-6™ Vegetable Oil Complex for a powerful aromatic experience. Light the Fire includes the naturally occurring constituents beta-caryophyllene, alpha-pinene, beta-pinene, and limonene.
products.excerpt: The warm, spicy aroma of Light the Fire™ includes Mastrante and Northern Lights Black Spruce from Young Living’s Ecuador and Canada farms, along with Nutmeg, Cassia, Ocotea, Canadian Fleabane, Lemon, Pepper, and Hinoki.

Lime oil has a versatile scent that complements most other citrus essential oils such as Lemon, Bergamot, Grapefruit, Orange, and Tangerine.
products.excerpt: With a bright and refreshing citrus scent, Lime essential oil smells just like freshly sliced limes.

products.name: Live Your Passion - 5ml
products.description: Live Your Passion™ essential oil blend was created specifically for the 2016 International Grand Convention to evoke feelings of empowerment, clarity, and inspiration. It combines Royal Hawaiian™ Sandalwood, Orange, Nutmeg, Lime, Idaho Blue Spruce, Northern Lights Black Spruce, Ylang Ylang, Frankincense, and Peppermint essential oils to help you pursue life with greater purpose and attention on the endeavors that matter most.

products.name: Manuka - 5ml
products.description: Manuka essential oil comes from the myrtle family, Myrtaceae, and is native to Australia and New Zealand. Steam distilled from the leaves and stems of the plant, Manuka oil has a woodsy, slightly sweet scent. Manuka essential oil can be compared to Tea Tree essential oil, as Manuka oil benefits the skin in a similar way. Some of the most popular Manuka oil uses include adding it to your favorite skin care products or using it in a foot soak. Manuka essential oil supports the appearance of healthy-looking skin, can help reduce the appearance of blemishes, and can be applied topically to feet or toenails to invigorate tired feet.
products.excerpt: Manuka essential oil comes from the myrtle family, Myrtaceae, and is native to Australia and New Zealand.

products.name: Marjoram
products.description: Marjoram is a key oil used in the Raindrop Technique and can be used in massage after exercise.
products.excerpt: Marjoram is a key oil used in the Raindrop Technique and can be used in massage after exercise.

products.name: Mastrante 5ml
products.description: The earthy aroma of Mastrante is calming and promotes feelings of relaxation. This particular variety is high in limonene and carvone and can be used topically to promote radiant-looking skin.
products.excerpt: The earthy aroma of Mastrante is calming and promotes feelings of relaxation.

products.name: Melaleuca Quinquenervia
products.description: Commonly known as Niaouli, Melaleuca Quinquenervia supports and stimulates healthy-looking skin with stronger properties than Tea Tree (Melaleuca Alternifolia) essential oil.
products.excerpt: Commonly known as Niaouli, Melaleuca Quinquenervia supports and stimulates healthy-looking skin with stronger properties than Tea Tree (Melaleuca Alternifolia) essential oil.

products.name: Melissa
products.description: Melissa essential oil comes from the melissa plant, which is also known as lemon balm and is part of the Lamiaceae—or mint—family. Young Living Melissa oil comes from our St. Maries farm in Idaho, where the oil is steam distilled from aerial parts of the plant before it flowers.
products.excerpt: Melissa essential oil comes from the melissa plant, which is also known as lemon balm and is part of the Lamiaceae—or mint—family.

products.name: Melrose
products.description: Melrose™ is a blend of essential oils with powerful cleansing properties that supports the appearance of skin.
products.excerpt: Melrose™ is a blend of essential oils with powerful cleansing properties that supports the appearance of skin.

products.name: Mister
products.description: Created for men, Mister™ oil blend is uplifting when diffused.
products.excerpt: Created for men, Mister™ oil blend is uplifting when diffused.

products.name: Motivation
products.description: The powerful scent of Motivation™ may promote feelings of action and accomplishment when diffused.
products.excerpt: The powerful scent of Motivation™ may promote feelings of action and accomplishment when diffused.

products.name: Mountain Savory
products.description: Mountain Savory has been used historically in topical applications on the body.
products.excerpt: Mountain Savory has been used historically in topical applications on the body.

products.name: Myrrh
products.description: Today, Myrrh oil is valued around the world, but anciently it was popular in the Middle East and Mediterranean. In fact, Myrrh’s name comes from the Arabic word murr, meaning bitter, because of its sharp taste. The oil is now recognized for its beautifying properties and grounding aroma, and Myrrh essential oil is common in cosmetic and aromatic industries.
products.excerpt: Today, Myrrh oil is valued around the world, but anciently it was popular in the Middle East and Mediterranean.

products.name: Myrtle
products.description: Myrtle has an elevating aroma that is pleasing when diffused. It also has properties that can help beautify and enhance the appearance of healthy-looking skin when applied topically.
products.excerpt: Myrtle has an elevating aroma that is pleasing when diffused.

products.name: Neroli
products.description: Extracted from orange blossoms, Neroli has a citrusy, floral scent. In ancient times, it was highly regarded for its uplifting aroma.*
products.excerpt: Extracted from orange blossoms, Neroli has a citrusy, floral scent.

products.excerpt: Northern Lights Black Spruce essential oil comes from Young Living’s new Northern Lights farm in British Columbia, Canada.

products.excerpt: Nutmeg has a warm, spicy aroma that is energizing and uplifting.

products.name: Ocotea
products.description: Produced from the distillation of an Ecuadorian tree, Ocotea has a complex aroma that is known for its skin-cleansing properties.
products.excerpt: Produced from the distillation of an Ecuadorian tree, Ocotea has a complex aroma that is known for its skin-cleansing properties.

products.name: Oola Balance
products.description: Oola®** Balance™ is designed to align and balance your center for a positive outlook and amplify the ability to focus on passions, behaviors, and health when diffused.
products.excerpt: Oola®** Balance™ is designed to align and balance your center for a positive outlook and amplify the ability to focus on passions, behaviors, and health when diffused.

products.name: Oola Grow
products.description: Oola®** Grow™ essential oil blend gives you courage to focus on the task at hand and helps you move toward positive advancement and progression.
products.excerpt: Oola®** Grow™ essential oil blend gives you courage to focus on the task at hand and helps you move toward positive advancement and progression.

products.name: Orange
products.description: Orange essential oil, cold-pressed from the rinds of oranges, has a juicy aroma reminiscent of the fresh fruit. An important ingredient in popular blends such as Citrus Fresh™, Abundance™, Christmas Spirit™, and Peace & Calming®, Orange oil offers a sweet, peaceful aroma that can fill a room with a sense of peace, harmony, and creativity.
products.excerpt: Orange essential oil, cold-pressed from the rinds of oranges, has a juicy aroma reminiscent of the fresh fruit.

products.name: Oregano
products.description: Oregano essential oil (Origanum vulgare) comes from the popular oregano plant, which is a member of the mint family and is native to areas of western Asia and the Mediterranean. Its warm, herbaceous qualities have made the plant a popular ingredient in Greek and Italian cuisine, but there are many Oregano oil uses in topical and aromatic applications as well.
products.excerpt: Oregano essential oil (Origanum vulgare) comes from the popular oregano plant, which is a member of the mint family and is native to areas of western Asia and the Mediterranean.

products.name: Palmarosa
products.description: Palmarosa grass is steam distilled to produce an oil with an aroma that can be stimulating and soothing when diffused.
products.excerpt: Palmarosa grass is steam distilled to produce an oil with an aroma that can be stimulating and soothing when diffused.

products.name: Palo Santo
products.description: Palo Santo has an inspiring fragrance and can be diffused for a cleansing and refreshing atmosphere. It can also be used for massage after activity.
products.excerpt: Palo Santo has an inspiring fragrance and can be diffused for a cleansing and refreshing atmosphere.

products.name: PanAway
products.description: PanAway® essential oil is a popular blend formulated by Young Living Founder D. Gary Young that has a refreshing, invigorating aroma and cooling sensation when applied to the skin. PanAway oil is a combination of Wintergreen, Helichrysum, Clove, and Peppermint essential oils. Popular PanAway® oil uses include applying it to tired muscles after exercise or to the neck and back any time of day to enjoy its soothing and stimulating aroma. PanAway oil is one of Young Living's most effective and popular products and is a must-have for every home!
products.excerpt: PanAway® essential oil is a popular blend formulated by Young Living Founder D. Gary Young that has a refreshing, invigorating aroma and cooling sensation when applied to the skin.

products.name: Patchouli
products.description: Patchouli oil (Pogostemon cablin) is carefully extracted through steam distillation of a low, bushy shrub native to tropical regions in Southeast Asia. Although the plant is part of the mint family, Patchouli essential oil has a powerful, musky scent, and because of its complex aroma, Patchouli oil uses often include perfumes, soaps, incense, and essential oil blends.
products.excerpt: Patchouli oil (Pogostemon cablin) is carefully extracted through steam distillation of a low, bushy shrub native to tropical regions in Southeast Asia.

products.name: Peace & Calming
products.description: Peace & Calming® essential oil is a gentle, sweet blend of Ylang Ylang, Orange, Tangerine, Patchouli, and Blue Tansy. This fragrant oil is a wonderful addition to your meditation, evening routine, or playtime with the kids. With a comforting, fresh aroma, Peace & Calming oil creates a relaxing environment that’s especially great for homes with children. You’ll love that you can use this oil for you children’s bedtime and then for yourself for a moment of quiet after the house has settled down.
products.excerpt: Peace & Calming® essential oil is a gentle, sweet blend of Ylang Ylang, Orange, Tangerine, Patchouli, and Blue Tansy.

products.name: Peace & Calming II
products.description: D. Gary Young specially formulated Peace & Calming II™ essential oil blend as his recommended option and alternate to Peace & Calming. Gary handpicked this new formulation to stay true to the original constituent character of its predecessor and offer the same great experience. The gentle aroma of Peace & Calming II includes Tangerine, Orange, Ylang Ylang, Patchouli, German Chamomile, Vetiver, Cistus, Bergamot, Cassia, Davana, and Young Living’s exclusive Northern Lights Black Spruce essential oils.
products.excerpt: D. Gary Young specially formulated Peace & Calming II™ essential oil blend as his recommended option and alternate to Peace & Calming.
ingredients: Picea Mariana† (Northern Lights Black Spruce) Leaf Oil

products.name: Peppermint
products.description: Fresh, nostalgic, and instantly recognizable, Peppermint essential oil’s scent invigorates the mind and senses, while inspiring a sense of peace. Used topically, Peppermint oil creates a cool, tingling sensation on the skin, making it a favorite for sports massage and an important part of Young Living’s Raindrop Technique®.
products.excerpt: Fresh, nostalgic, and instantly recognizable, Peppermint essential oil’s scent invigorates the mind and senses, while inspiring a sense of peace.

products.name: Petitgrain
products.description: Petitgrain is refreshing and uplifting when used aromatically. This oil is also supportive of the appearance of skin and hair.
products.excerpt: Petitgrain is refreshing and uplifting when used aromatically.
ingredients: Citrus Aurantium Amara† (Bitter Orange) Leaf/twig Oil

products.name: Pine
products.description: Pine essential oil has a refreshing and empowering aroma. When diffused, this oil has a calming scent.
products.excerpt: Pine essential oil has a refreshing and empowering aroma.

products.name: Present Time
products.description: When diffused, Present Time™ helps you focus on the here and now, so you can get beyond the past and move forward.
products.excerpt: When diffused, Present Time™ helps you focus on the here and now, so you can get beyond the past and move forward.
ingredients: Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil

products.name: Purification
products.description: Ditch overpowering and harsh chemical-based sprays and keep your home smelling fresh and clean with Young Living’s Purification® essential oil. This blend is made up of six essential oils for the ultimate weapon against odors. Citronella, Lavandin, Lemongrass, Rosemary, Myrtle, and Tea Tree work together to create a refreshing, bright scent that keeps you and your family happy and comfortable.
products.excerpt: Ditch overpowering and harsh chemical-based sprays and keep your home smelling fresh and clean with Young Living’s Purification® essential oil.

products.name: RC
products.description: R.C.™ Essential Oil is a powerful blend of Spruce, Cypress, and three types of Eucalyptus oils (E. globulus, E. radiata, and E. citriodora). Diffuse or apply it directly before, during, or after your workout. Its energetic aroma will help you stay motivated when you hit the weights, treadmill, or bike.
products.excerpt: R.C.™ Essential Oil is a powerful blend of Spruce, Cypress, and three types of Eucalyptus oils (E. globulus, E. radiata, and E. citriodora). Diffuse or apply it directly before, during, or after your workout.

products.name: Raven
products.description: Raven™ is a cleansing blend of Ravintsara, Peppermint, Eucalyptus Radiata, and other essential oils. Raven creates a cooling sensation when applied topically to the chest and throat.
products.excerpt: Raven™ is a cleansing blend of Ravintsara, Peppermint, Eucalyptus Radiata, and other essential oils.

products.name: Ravintsara
products.description: Ravintsara has a pleasant and clean scent, is commonly used in meditation, and contains skin-cleansing properties.
products.excerpt: Ravintsara has a pleasant and clean scent, is commonly used in meditation, and contains skin-cleansing properties.

products.name: Release
products.description: Release™ is a blend with a relaxing aroma that facilitates the ability to let go of anger and frustration. It also promotes harmony and balance when diffused.
products.excerpt: Release™ is a blend with a relaxing aroma that facilitates the ability to let go of anger and frustration.
ingredients: Santalum Paniculatum† (Royal Hawaiian™ Sandalwood) Wood Oil

products.name: Relieve It
products.description: Relieve It™ is a comforting balance of pure Black Spruce, Black Pepper, and other essential oils that combines their soothing properties into one useful topical blend.
products.excerpt: Relieve It™ is a comforting balance of pure Black Spruce, Black Pepper, and other essential oils that combines their soothing properties into one useful topical blend.

products.name: Roman Chamomile
products.description: Roman Chamomile (Chamaemelum nobile) has a sweet, herbaceous aroma with notes of bright apple. Its warmth and gentleness can help create a relaxing and calming atmosphere that can make a wonderful addition to children’s nurseries or play areas. Soothing to all types of skin, it’s often used in skin and hair products and even perfumes. Roman Chamomile is a key ingredient in many of Young Living’s most popular blends, including Awaken™, Forgiveness™, and Joy™.
products.excerpt: Roman Chamomile (Chamaemelum nobile) has a sweet, herbaceous aroma with notes of bright apple.

products.name: Rose
products.description: Rose oil—the product of one of the most recognizable and culturally significant flowers in the world—has a rich, intoxicating aroma that’s just as beautiful as the bloom itself. Rose essential oil is distilled to gently release the delicate flower’s oil through steam. Because each 5-ml bottle requires 22 pounds of rose petals, Rose oil is one of the most valuable essential oils you can acquire.
products.excerpt: Rose oil—the product of one of the most recognizable and culturally significant flowers in the world—has a rich, intoxicating aroma that’s just as beautiful as the bloom itself.

products.name: Rosemary
products.description: Rosemary oil (Rosmarinus officinalis) is steam distilled from a perennial shrub with needle-like leaves that can remain evergreen in warmer climates. The botanical, which is part of the mint family, is native to Mediterranean regions and has blue or purple flowers that give it an understated beauty. The familiar scent of Rosemary essential oil—as well as its robust, herbaceous aroma—has made it popular in aromatic and personal care products.
products.excerpt: Rosemary oil (Rosmarinus officinalis) is steam distilled from a perennial shrub with needle-like leaves that can remain evergreen in warmer climates.

products.name: SARA
products.description: SARA™ is a blend of Geranium, Ylang Ylang, Rose, Blue Tansy, and other oils that is designed as a soothing scent to be used during difficult or emotional times.
products.excerpt: SARA™ is a blend of Geranium, Ylang Ylang, Rose, Blue Tansy, and other oils that is designed as a soothing scent to be used during difficult or emotional times.

products.name: Sacred Frankincense
products.description: Sacred Frankincense™ essential oil comes from the distillation of the resin of the Boswellia sacra frankincense tree. This oil is ideal for those who wish to take their spiritual journey and meditation experiences to a higher level.
products.excerpt: Sacred Frankincense™ essential oil comes from the distillation of the resin of the Boswellia sacra frankincense tree.

products.name: Sacred Mountain
products.description: Sacred Mountain™ is a blend of Ylang Ylang and conifer oils that evokes the sense of sanctity found in nature and promotes feelings of strength, empowerment, grounding, and protection when diffused.
products.excerpt: Sacred Mountain™ is a blend of Ylang Ylang and conifer oils that evokes the sense of sanctity found in nature and promotes feelings of strength, empowerment, grounding, and protection when diffused.

products.name: Sacred Sandalwood
products.description: This variety of sandalwood is native to India but is cultivated and steam distilled at our partner farm in Australia’s tropical northern outback. Sacred Sandalwood essential oil provides an uplifting, warm, woodsy, and sweet aroma, while offering a variety of skin benefits. Sandalwood is a recognizable base note in many perfumes and fragrances. Its distinctly warm and woodsy aroma is the perfect complement to pampering spa treatments, relaxation time, yoga, and meditation. It can also help you recapture the qualities of younger-looking skin and enhance your favorite skin and hair products.
products.excerpt: This variety of sandalwood is native to India but is cultivated and steam distilled at our partner farm in Australia’s tropical northern outback.

products.name: Sage
products.description: Sage emits a strong, spicy, clarifying, and uplifting aroma when diffused. It has been used traditionally for its clarifying properties.
products.excerpt: Sage emits a strong, spicy, clarifying, and uplifting aroma when diffused.

products.name: Sensation
products.description: Sensation™ combines pure Ylang Ylang, Coriander, and other essential oils to encourage feelings of love and affection when diffused.
products.excerpt: Sensation™ combines pure Ylang Ylang, Coriander, and other essential oils to encourage feelings of love and affection when diffused.
ingredients: Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (furanocoumarin-Free Bergamot) Peel Oil

products.name: Spearmint
products.description: Spearmint is milder than Peppermint and is characterized by an invigorating fragrance that is uplifting and calming.
products.excerpt: Spearmint is milder than Peppermint and is characterized by an invigorating fragrance that is uplifting and calming.

products.name: Stress Away
products.description: Stress Away™ essential oil blend is the first product to contain the unique combination of Lime essential oil and Vanilla extract. The distinct mix of Vanilla and Lime gives Stress Away essential oil blend its unique and pleasant aroma—among other benefits. Stress Away oil also includes Copaiba, which has a history of beneficial properties in topical application; Lavender, with its refreshing and calming scent; and Cedarwood, which features the powerful plant constituent cedrol. All of these ingredients are expertly blended with the exotic scent of Ocotea, a unique Ecuadorian-sourced essential oil. With a perfectly balanced aroma of both tropical and citrus notes, Stress Away essential oil blend is a uniquely relaxing oasis in a fast-paced world.
products.excerpt: Stress Away™ essential oil blend is the first product to contain the unique combination of Lime essential oil and Vanilla extract.

products.name: Surrender
products.description: Surrender™ is a blend of Lavender, Black Spruce, Roman Chamomile, and other essential oils that provides aromas to help cast off inhibitions that may be controlling your life or limiting your potential.
products.excerpt: Surrender™ is a blend of Lavender, Black Spruce, Roman Chamomile, and other essential oils that provides aromas to help cast off inhibitions that may be controlling your life or limiting your potential.

products.name: Tangerine
products.description: Tangerine essential oil (Citrus reticulata) is extracted by cold pressing the rind of the tangerine fruit. Tangerines, which are part of the Rutaceae family, likely originated in Southeast Asia and have since spread to subtropical areas around the world. Like the fresh citrus fruit, Tangerine oil is loved by children and adults alike, with its delightfully sweet aroma that can create a happy, contented mindset.
products.excerpt: Tangerine essential oil (Citrus reticulata) is extracted by cold pressing the rind of the tangerine fruit.

products.name: Tarragon
products.description: Tarragon oil brings a soothing and uplifting scent to any space when diffused.
products.excerpt: Tarragon oil brings a soothing and uplifting scent to any space when diffused.

products.name: Tea Tree (Melaleuca Alternifolia)
products.description: Tea Tree oil, also known as Melaleuca alternifolia or Melaleuca oil, is one of the most widely used and extensively researched essential oils, making it a must-have for every home. Because the benefits of Tea Tree oil include cleansing properties and a refreshing scent, this versatile oil can be used for everything from home cleaning solutions to skin care.
products.excerpt: Tea Tree oil, also known as Melaleuca alternifolia or Melaleuca oil, is one of the most widely used and extensively researched essential oils, making it a must-have for every home.

products.name: The Gift
products.description: The Gift™ is a blend of seven ancient oils that have been sought after for centuries for their calming properties. This blend was inspired by the fictional character Shutran from The One Gift, a novel by Young Living founder D. Gary Young.
products.excerpt: The Gift™ is a blend of seven ancient oils that have been sought after for centuries for their calming properties.

products.name: Thieves
products.description: Thieves® essential oil is a powerful combination of Clove, Lemon, Cinnamon, Eucalyptus Radiata, and Rosemary essential oils for an aromatic blend that fills any space with a rich, spicy aroma. Inspired by the legend of four 15th-century French thieves who formulated a special aromatic combination composed of clove, rosemary, and other botanicals used while robbing the dead and dying, Thieves is one of Young Living’s most popular products.
products.excerpt: Thieves® essential oil is a powerful combination of Clove, Lemon, Cinnamon, Eucalyptus Radiata, and Rosemary essential oils for an aromatic blend that fills any space with a rich, spicy aroma.

products.name: Three (3) Wise Men
products.description: The 3 Wise Men™ blend contains Sandalwood, Frankincense, Myrrh, and other essential oils and is designed to promote feelings of reverence and spiritual awareness.
products.excerpt: The 3 Wise Men™ blend contains Sandalwood, Frankincense, Myrrh, and other essential oils and is designed to promote feelings of reverence and spiritual awareness.
ingredients: Santalum Paniculatum† (Royal Hawaiian™ Sandalwood) Wood Oil

products.name: Thyme
products.description: Thyme is a key ingredient in Ortho Ease massage oil and is great for use after exercise. It is also believed to bring a sense of purpose when used aromatically.
products.excerpt: Thyme is a key ingredient in Ortho Ease massage oil and is great for use after exercise.

products.name: Transformation
products.description: Transformation™ includes Idaho Blue Spruce, Palo Santo, and Ocotea. These powerful essential oils empower you to replace negative beliefs with uplifting thoughts when diffused.
products.excerpt: Transformation™ includes Idaho Blue Spruce, Palo Santo, and Ocotea.
ingredients: Santalum Paniculatum† (Royal Hawaiian™ Sandalwood) Wood Oil
Picea Pungens† (Idaho Blue Spruce) Branch/leaf/wood Oil

products.name: Trauma Life
products.description: Trauma Life™ is a natural blend of pure Sandalwood, Helichrysum, Rose, and other essential oils designed to offer support during difficult emotional exploration.
products.excerpt: Trauma Life™ is a natural blend of pure Sandalwood, Helichrysum, Rose, and other essential oils designed to offer support during difficult emotional exploration.
ingredients: Santalum Paniculatum† (Royal Hawaiian™ Sandalwood) Wood Oil

products.name: Tsuga
products.description: Tsuga has skin-cleansing properties and is spiritually uplifting. Its fresh aroma is the result of steam-distilling the needles and twigs of the conifer tree.
products.excerpt: Tsuga has skin-cleansing properties and is spiritually uplifting.

products.name: Valerian
products.description: Valerian oil is produced from the distillation of the botanical’s root and has a unique fragrance that is calming and grounding. Use this oil topically on the back of the neck or on the bottoms of feet.
products.excerpt: Valerian oil is produced from the distillation of the botanical’s root and has a unique fragrance that is calming and grounding.

products.name: Valor
products.description: Valor® essential oil blend is one of our most popular products and a favorite of founder D. Gary Young. Its woodsy, positive scent comes from a blend of Black Spruce, Blue Tansy, and Frankincense. Valor is great for massages, in addition to other topical and aromatic uses.
products.excerpt: Valor® essential oil blend is one of our most popular products and a favorite of founder D. Gary Young.

products.name: Vetiver
products.description: Vetiver oil comes from a perennial grass native to tropical regions in Asia and has an earthy, exotic aroma. It is steam distilled from the plant’s root, giving it a warm, woodsy scent that has been used for its fragrance since ancient times. The oil remains popular today, and Vetiver oil uses include colognes and fragrances—especially for men—as well as soaps and moisturizers.
products.excerpt: Vetiver oil comes from a perennial grass native to tropical regions in Asia and has an earthy, exotic aroma.

products.name: Wintergreen
products.description: Wintergreen’s refreshing minty aroma is stimulating and invigorating. It’s a great addition to lotions that are applied after activity.
products.excerpt: Wintergreen’s refreshing minty aroma is stimulating and invigorating.

products.name: Xiang Mao
products.description: Xiang Mao was used traditionally to freshen household air, enlighten the mind, and moisten the skin.
products.excerpt: Xiang Mao was used traditionally to freshen household air, enlighten the mind, and moisten the skin.

products.name: Ylang Ylang
products.description: Grown and distilled from trees at Young Living's farm in Ecuador, Ylang Ylang oil is extracted by steam distilling the star-shaped flowers found on the tropical ylang ylang tree. With its rich, floral scent, Ylang Ylang essential oil has become a popular element in luxurious and indulgent perfumes and skin care products.
products.excerpt: Grown and distilled from trees at Young Living's farm in Ecuador, Ylang Ylang oil is extracted by steam distilling the star-shaped flowers found on the tropical ylang ylang tree.
